name: Magic Labyrinth Mafujin
description:
Around the rural town of Laville, there were many "labyrinths" that were the ruins of the ruins of the ruined Kingdom of Laville.
The main character, Roni, will explore the labyrinth at the command of his master, the Great Mage Ilvan.
While exploring the labyrinth using magic circles and ancient magic
We will be deeply involved in the "Legend of Rabil" that is handed down in the town and solve the mystery ...
